SEARCH
Module edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.java.finalproject
Package edu.rpi.cs.chane5.networking.commands

Class Command

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.chane5.networking.commands.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndGameCommand, HandshakeCommand, RestartGameCommand, StartGameCommand, WinGameCommand
public abstract class Command extends Object
Command class base used to create commands for the network protocol between Client and Server. The parsed command uses a '\u2401' as a delimiter after the command name and between each argument. The parsed string is in the format name'\u2401'arg'\u2401'arg2 with as many arguments as needed.
All commands need to be registered with Registry.register(Command) in order for the protocol in Connection.receive() to be able to process that command.
Version:
"1.0"
